sentences.en: A pirate ship was always decorated with a black flag bearing a white skull and crossbones.
sentences.cn: 海盗船通常悬挂一面白色的骷髅旗.

sentences.en: Skull and crossbones stickers on the drums aroused the suspicion of the customs officers.
sentences.cn: 这些桶上贴着的骷髅标志引起了海关官员的怀疑。

sentences.en: The bottle had a skull and crossbones symbol on it.
sentences.cn: 瓶子上有骷髅和交叉的股骨图形.

sentences.en: The skull - and - crossbones crudely carved on the first tombstones was replaced by a winged cherub.
sentences.cn: 最初粗糙地刻在墓碑上的骷髅与 交叉 的大腿骨图形,已为带翅膀的天使所代替.

sentences.en: They stamped a skull and crossbones on the labels of poisonous drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们在毒药标签上打上骷髅图.

words.tran_cn: 交叉的；划掉的；十字形的
交叉；越过（cross的过去式和过去分词）
